name: 10 Seconds to Win!
description:
10 Seconds to Win! is a platform game where you only have 10 seconds to complete each stage.

At each level there will be a timer with 10 seconds for you to complete the level, if it takes longer you will die!



⮞ 100 Levels
⮞ 100 Achievements
⮞ Intuitive Interface
⮞ Cute Pixel-Art
⮞ Great Music

Pixel-Art by: Solluco
